ItemDesc: Upon use, one of the following effects will be randomly applied to all allies in the next battle: Mirror Princess Edition — DEF increases by <unbreak>36%</unbreak>. Miss Note Edition — Max HP increases by <unbreak>30%</unbreak>.
ItemBGDesc: A limited-edition version of Dreamville-themed souvenirs, offered exclusively in Clock Studios Theme Park. This series is currently available in two editions: Miss Note and Mirror Princess. "Hooray! Mutant heads!" "Your taste is so weird..."
